title: Panel, ca. 1810
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: tempera painted on taffeta
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Persian style yellow silk taffeta ground painted in tempera, in multicolor cartouches framed by diagonally intersecting blends enclosing in staggered rows two floral compositions, one containing a peacock, intersection gruadrefoils—framing female head.
